channel.title: Flamethrower mod for HL2, Ep1 and/or Ep2...
channel.description: Does anyone know of a mod that adds a Flamethrower in singleplayer HL2 or any of the episodes? I mean with an actual ingame model, not that SMOD Gravity Gun that functions as a flamethrower.

item.title: Flamethrower mod for HL2, Ep1 and/or Ep2...
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Replacing it would only make it look/sound different. You’d need new DLLs.

Read full topic

item.title: Flamethrower mod for HL2, Ep1 and/or Ep2...
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
You can’t. Half-Life 2 doesn’t support adding new weapons. That only works in Garrysmod or SMOD because they support being able to script new weapons.

Read full topic
item.source: Flamethrower mod for HL2, Ep1 and/or Ep2...

item.title: Flamethrower mod for HL2, Ep1 and/or Ep2...
item.dc:creator: KernCore
item.description:
I dunno… but when I google “HL2 Flamethrower Mod” I just find things like “Fortress Forever effects” or SMOD and so on… But when you want a flamethrower in Hl2… you should ask your question in the FPSbanana HL2 forum… its a community for skinners, mappers and so on…

Read full topic
